name: Jekyll and Hyde
description:
The box body has split into two, each with their own skill that they must use to clear the tasks ahead. However, the nature of their split has made recombining unstable, where even a horizontal overlap is a fatal move that can kill both of them.  Can they reach the level's end and escape their predicament?

(currently missing some planned features, a version update is possible in the future)

Controls (currently controller only, keyboard will be added):

Left stick/Control pad - Blue Movement

Right stick/Face buttons - Red Movement

Left Trigger  - Blue Jump

Credits:
